response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment that truly stands out and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering this, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a price of $10,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a price slightly above its perceived value by you, ensuring both satisfaction and a good deal. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10000}
